agents.name: General bugs
agents.summary:
Several bugs were addressed:
*   `hero-section.tsx`: Corrected `MediaPlaceholder` import path and changed to a named import.
*   `mcp-content-generator.ts`: Added type assertion for `category` to resolve a type mismatch.
*   `blog-post-content.tsx`: Updated `rehype-pretty-code` callback signatures (`onVisitHighlightedWord` to `onVisitHighlightedChars`, added `id` parameter).
*   `next.config.mjs`: Removed deprecated `typescript.ignoreBuildErrors` and `swcMinify` options.
*   Installed missing `shiki` dependency and configured ESLint via `.eslintrc.json`.
*   Updated Next.js to `16.1.6` to fix high-severity vulnerabilities.

agents.name: Add auth middleware
agents.summary:
Implemented JWT-based authentication middleware for the API.
*   Added `auth-middleware.ts` with token validation and role extraction.
*   Wired middleware into Express app for `/api/*` routes.
*   Updated OpenAPI spec with security schemes and bearer auth.
*   Added unit tests for middleware and refreshed integration tests.

agents.name: Fix offline sync
agents.summary:
Resolved race conditions and data loss in offline-first sync.
*   Fixed conflict resolution in `sync-engine.ts` when merging local and remote changes.
*   Added retry with exponential backoff for failed sync requests.
*   Improved handling of deleted records and tombstone cleanup.
*   Updated sync status UI to show last successful sync time.

agents.name: Update API docs
agents.summary: Regenerating REST API documentation from OpenAPI spec and fixing broken examples.
